price: Òjíṣẹ́ kúkú ti dé bá wọn láààrin ara wọn. Wọ́n sì pè é ní òpùrọ́. Nítorí náà, ọwọ́ ìyà bà wọ́n. Alábòsí sì ni wọ́n.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ جَآءَهُمۡ رَسُولٞ مِّنۡهُمۡ فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ وَهُمۡ ظَٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: walaqad jāahum rasūlun min'hum fakadhabūhu fa-akhadhahumu al-ʿadhābu wahum ẓālimūna
